TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {63918=Born to rock? Heavy Metal Merchant’s got your gear! We have been rockin’ out on eBay since 2003 and pride ourselves on excellence. We believe that a business based on customer service will surely succeed, and back every item we sell with a 100% satisfaction guarantee. Our feedback is testament to this. We treat you how we want to be treated. It’s that simple. If you aren't happy, we aren't happy! If you ever have a question or concern, please contact us. Visit our About Me page for more info. Every band needs fans -- we need you. Thanks for shopping with us. We hope to see you again soon.}
textBeforeTable: Payment details returns - opens in a new window or tab. Refunds by law: In Australia, consumers have a legal right to obtain a refund from a business for goods purchased if the goods are faulty, not fit for purpose or don't match description. More information at Your complete satisfaction is our top priority. Please inspect your purchase carefully when you receive it. If there is anything wrong, please contact us immediately and we will ensure you get an immediate replacement or a refund if a replacement is not available. Return policy details The buyer is responsible for return postage costs. Exchange 60 days after the buyer receives it Refund will be given as Item must be returned within Return policy
textAfterTable: Seller's payment instructions The winner will receive an "eBay End of Auction" email. Click on the payment link and follow instructions, please ensure you have correct postage amount entered. Once payment is received, we will ship product usually within 24 hours If you are new to eBay and have questions about our payment policy or anything else, please e-mail us and we will be glad to assist you with your transaction.
